summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the Pix2Struct model implementation, checking its initialization, configuration loading, forward‑pass signatures, hidden‑state and attention outputs, embedding resizing (both tied and untied), gradient handling, training behavior, gradient checkpointing, and TorchScript conversion.
business_intent: Provide confidence that the Pix2Struct model works correctly and efficiently for image‑to‑structure generation tasks, enabling developers to integrate a reliable model into production pipelines.
